page.title: 03Filey Fishing Festival.
page.content: The Annual Fishing Festival takes place during the first week in September.All the cobles are involved in this for only a week.The highest total weight,the heaviest weight and a sealed weight are fished for prizes and cups. Some of the old fishing family names are still fishing out of Filey:_Jenkinsons,Cammish,Cappleman, Johnson and Wyvill.While the younger fishermen have brought new names to the fishing industry:-Adams,Barr, Smith,Kennedy and Wilkes.This is most interesting as in the past it was traditionally passed from father to son,but now there is new 'blood' coming into Filey's fishing industry.
